plot: A grandfather, who knows the science of handcrafted ice creams, has fallen ill only days before the festival. His very young grandchildren will face the daunting mountain to get the ice necessary to make them.
title: Los helados del Cumbal
plot_es: A grandfather, who knows the science of handcrafted ice creams, has fallen ill only days before the festival. His very young grandchildren will face the daunting mountain to get the ice necessary to make them.
plot_en: A grandfather, who knows the science of handcrafted ice creams, has fallen ill only days before the festival. His very young grandchildren will face the daunting mountain to get the ice necessary to make them.
